reviews.text: Every time I go in there these two lgbtq plus employees one being a manager always give me attitude and are so unprofessional they leave my order sit there until I ask for it the food is good service is terrible

I have been here twice since the snackwrap were released on June 10th (it‚Äôs only been two days) and on both occasions that i came I am being told there not in stock. Why advertise something you are not selling.

Never open on time in the morning. Uber orders are missing utensils and condiments 90% of the time. They don‚Äôt listen when you order in person or through the drive through. My order is wrong so much that I have to write a review. Get it together

The manager name Daniel very nasty very unprofessional talk crap in Spanish about the customers makes u uncomfortable and does not put customer service first - served me cold food and water down drinks embarrassed me made a scene and  gets upset at you about it and talks very disrespectful attitude is nasty that‚Äôs not what leadership is - u have to bite your food to know if it is hot you can also taste when food is old  or been sitting out to long. They seriously need English speaking people that actually work in the store. Also, the people were EXTREMELY slow and rude. The cashier, I didn't get her name was rude. She completely messed up my order. And on top of that, she forgot an order. It looks like only one person is behind her. The lines were slow. Do better.

Gusto at the drive thru beware. He is horrible taking orders . He always gets it wrong. His staff learns from him so they horrible to. I got the wrong order from Gus several times. Don't recommend this location. Trash all around. If you have a card on file they will charge it without asking first. Just assume you want to use it Then got upset when he had to give me a refund and refused me the sale.

Hoy hace 1-2 horas entr√© a este Mcdonalds para utilizar el ba√±o.. como otras localidades en NYC tienen ba√±o libre, pens√© que este tambi√©n (no importa si yo ten√≠a que consumir algo pero trat√© de ver si como quiera el ba√±o estaba libre), un seguridad se me acerca y me dice ‚Äútienes que tener factura para utilizar el ba√±o‚Äù yo, inmediatamente le respondo, decentemente, ‚Äúok, me voy a comprar una botellita de agua‚Äù.. el hombre coge y se me PEGA hacia a mi y se pone a esperar al lado de la cajera a que yo pida mi orden. Eventualmente, yo me dirijo hacia el ba√±o y este individuo me sigue siguiendo y yo, ya viendo la actitud que el cargaba, le digo que yo me puedo abrir la puerta del ba√±o a lo que el responde ‚Äúpues no lo uses porque soy yo quien lo abro‚Äù.. yo le se√±alo que el me coment√≥ que yo necesitaba exclusivamente el recibo CON el c√≥digo para entrar al ba√±o.. y va y el viene. Para no alargar el cuento, el no me quiso abrir la puerta del ba√±o hasta que finalmente lo hizo y me dijo ‚Äúno seas tan hedionda‚Äù..

Mi pregunta es, esta es la clase de gente que trabajan dando un servicio en McDonalds? Yo simplemente quer√≠a usar un ba√±o y aun as√≠ consum√≠ como un cliente normal. Yo nunca le falt√© el respeto a este hombre pero S√ç me sent√≠ inc√≥moda como el se lo tom√≥ personal conmigo sigui√©ndome y pegado de mi.. yo entiendo que a esa sucursal puede ser que vayan drogadictos e impertinentes a molestar pero tienen que manejarse mejor.

This McDonald's is horrible. From atmosphere to service, they didn't know what a soft drink was. They just told me that didn't have anymore. I think about this as I look at this homeless person sleeping as I sip my sprite and somebody's random music blast in my ear.
Too many kids that hangout in here not an friendly environment for kids to sit down and eat with there parents mangers don't enforce no structure

If you‚Äôre nearby and need a place for warmth don‚Äôt worry just come to this McDonald‚Äôs there is a person sleeping and multiple Latino men with Doordash, Uber, etc. bags taking up all the seats to the left of the place. There food is not worth it either. I don‚Äôt know where they learned to make a Frappe but I‚Äôve never been to a place that made a frappe like this. This place disappoints all the time.
It was a wonderful experience at McDonalds. They clean after each customer. I enjoy this McDonalds location.

AS USUAL  THESE PEOPLE  WORK HARD AND WERE VERY RESPECTFUL  ,AND HELPFUL AND KIND TO ME AND MY FAMILY  THANK YOU SO MUCH GUYS

I have lived in this neighborhood for 10 years and I have never had a problem with your staff.
I visit your restaurant 3-4 times a week because I have many children.
Today one of your unprofessional girls attacked me.I didn't have a receipt, but I had a number to pay .Instead of asking if I had a receipt or an order number, she simply threatened me that she would not take my order.
She doesn't know how to express herself professionally and instead of realizing her mistake, she even called me crazy"loco".
Yes, I am not Spanish, but I live in a Spanish-speaking area. I understand when Spanish-speaking people communicate with me.

This is one of the worst McDonald‚Äôs in the Bronx. The customer service is horrible and need diversity training immediately. One of the associates (who is a lighter skin man) told an employee in Spanish that I shouldn‚Äôt be ordering at the‚Ä¶

JUSTO CUANDO REVISO MI ORDEN ME DOY CUENTA QUE OLVIDARON PONER MIS NUGGETS CUANDO REGRESO NO ME DEJAN PASAR PORQUE ESTAN CERRADOS. PESIMO SERVICIO DEL EQUIPO DE LA NOCHE. THEY RE PLAYING, DEBERIAN PONER MAS ATENCION A LO QUE HACEN.

MANAGER A CARGO:  CAROLYN C.
The fries and nuggets were fresh and hot! The cashier was very nice and brought the food to the table! She even came back and asked if we needed anything else! Frappes were also good!<3

This store is consistently slow with their service. I work near by, and use them regularly. I can tell you, you will nearly always wait LONG waits. The staff that works mornings, say before noon, stand around and talk. They are slow walkers. They do not care at all if you have waited over ten minutes. Right now, I have waited over 25 minutes for a McGriddle, large caramel coffee, and large Reg coffee

This McDonald's is like any other one, in the sense that it looks like any other one, and the food also looks and tastes the same. But the atmosphere is really heavy in this location, especially at night , it's hard to enjoy your food if you decide to eat in. That's just my opinion, and about the drive thru I honestly didn't even know there was one so I can't say anything about the experience.  Other then that the food and the service are ok.

The people that is actually working here, around 3 or 4 in my humble doesn't fit at this place..today I was expecting some cashier in the line and I didn't know that I had to order in the digital kiosk but nobody care or even have the‚Ä¶

I ordered double cheese burger combo from this fast-food and I received a very cold and old looking dry hamburger in the bag. The food was not fresh and was very dry. I was planning to return it back to the restaurant but I was already on the highway. I hope they stop serving cold food and cook fresh food. I was not happy at all with the food so I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place to anyone.

I ordered breakfast from the drive through, the entire order came out wrong. I ordered 2 sausage and egg McMuffins 1 hash brown and 1 large iced coffee. I got 2 ham egg and cheese McMuffins a cold hash brown and a hot coffee. I did not have time to have the order fixed as I was in a hurry to get to work. Spoke to 2 different people while placing my order, so that might have been why my order was wrong.

I come here because I like how it is one of the few restaurants with the places to fill your own drinks but this place could honestly be kept cleaner. I understand that they get a large amount of foot traffic but I usually do not go in‚Ä¶
Do not eat here I got 4 for $5 bag with the chicken sandwich so it was $6. I ate that food appropriately 30 minutes later I was throwing up with diarrhea. I wouldn't let my dog eat here.
I had to wait an excessively long time for my food at the drive thru. There was no one in the drive thru and they employee took my order and it took him over 10 minutes to have my order ready.

The last times i was on the drive thru some guy was complaining about an order the workers who bring the orders out  to the cars parked outside we're playing attention to this guy  and his order now i was waiting for My orders an extra  few minutes  they couldnt find anyone to bring me My order to me i had to wait an extra few minutes till i was able to get close  enough in my car to get to the drive thru  to get My order i don't go there alot but they have been getting very slow with the orders lately they're usually not like that unless it's crowded on the drive thru

Service and cleanliness is good. Never had an issue with orders here. The only reason they get a 4 star is because there is always a bunch of delivery guy with mopeds out front blocking the entrance and driving up so I have almost been hit a few times.

Every time I use drive thru and the person at the window can never hear my orders.  The person always says it's the headset messing up. You would think management would've had that issue fixed by now.  it's been 2 years now I've been hearing that.  Then today hot, almost 90 degrees outside before 2pm, I order a smoothie to cool off and the lady says smoothie machine is out for the day because they just cleaned the machine.  WHAT???? Are they serious?
Don't expect the best service and they're ALWAYS out of SOMETHING. EVERYTIME.
POOR MANAGEMENT. POOR INVENTORY.

They say they are 24 hours but they have the door locked and when you go to the drive through because you‚Äôre not on a bike or in a car they deny you service.  I just came off a 12 hour shift and  cant even get food at this time.  Horrible customer service

Dirtiest McDonald‚Äôs I‚Äôve seen. Constant homeless people and crackheads digging into the garbage bin that‚Äôs next to the cashiers to grab bottles or cups so they could fill it up with soda, witnessed so many homeless people putting their hands all over the soda machines, all over the ice tray, horrific. Not one employee says anything. All the Uber drivers get free cups to get soda while we have to pay, unbelievable. Don‚Äôt catch me at this McDonald‚Äôs, not to mention the incredibly loud teenagers who are always in and out with such scandal. Sad to see a childhood memory turn into a nightmare. HUGE NO.

Well what can you say it's McDonald's not Friday's!! Even still it's so ghetto the delivery drivers are inside in large numbers waiting to get a notification so it makes thr atmosphere uncomfortable. The food disgusting not fully cooked and to top it off any one can come in. Two homeless guys walked in and dug in the trash to get cups and then get drinks at the soda fountain!! Among others who walked in to get a refreshing beverage in there water bottles!! They didn't care at all and it shows every where. The food the vibez and the overall cleanliness as well the lack of consideration with people coming in to get free drinks without a say!!!!

Idek where to start with this place! The store definitely needs new management. The place is always full of deliveries awaiting orders but honestly just look like a hangout area as they are smoking vape, playing around and talking extremely loud all the time. Sometimes there‚Äôs no place to sit because they take all of the space. The atmosphere is very uncomfortable with all these ‚Äúdeliveries‚Äùjust doing nothing flirting with the workers and smoking vape. Many times they are all grouped outside the store smoking HOOKAHü§¢.
Yesterday I was trying to enjoy a meal with my sister and some of the guys (the all appeared to be dominican) were trying to flirt with us disturbing our time at the store. We couldn‚Äôt eat in peace! I feel so bad for this place & the worst part of it is that the female workers entertain the ‚Äúdeliveries‚Äù behavior. Not to mention that the food is always undercook or overcook, but never cook properly. The order is always missing items.
